JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesSenior Software Development Engineer:Skills and experiences required:• 7-9 years of experience working in Microsoft Technology stack• Proficient experience with C#, Java Script and .Net• Experience and applicable knowledge in backend development in C#, relational databases, NoSQL, Web services and cloud infrastructure.• Experience and applicable knowledge with HTML 5, CSS3 and Angular 6+• Development from specs - Ability to find requirements and break them down into an actionable execution plan for the team and proactively identify problems.• Analytical ability – recognize the factors and circumstances involved in a problem and break down / simplify the problem using clearly defined criteria• Innovation and Creativity – to show a willingness to understand innovative ideas and to apply new insights to existing situations• Solution Design – Ability to define and describe an architecture of a system and understand the cause and effect of their coding• Work experience in agile environment• Collaborative communication skills (written and oral) - Ability to convert technical concepts into non-technical• Very good written and verbal communications in English• Quality and teamwork oriented
